name: Welcome to Medellin - Sky Effect - Challenge
name_original: Welcome to Medellin - Sky Effect - Challenge
description:
Have you ever wanted to get to know a bit of a culture in a fun and immersive way?

Medellin is a city in Colombia full of a lot of culture, rich cultural diversity

we connect real world experiences through Sky Effects

Welcome to Medellin is an initiative that was born to bring to the real and virtual world a unique concept inspired by our Colombian roots.

Tourists have the opportunity to share their experiences with Sky Effects, giving unique value to their trip through this great city of Colombia.

Within the experience we explain a little of the main concepts of Medellin at a musical tourist level,

gastronomicand artistic.

Like the typical food of Medellín, the bandeja paisa, the traditional hat, its music, the works of the famous artist Botero among other things.

Thanks to this technology we can connect more than 1,500 people who visit this place daily, impacting in a positive way.

because we believe that the sky is not the limit.
